title: [K-12] Heuristic Evaluation Training for Optimizing Usability of e-Learning Materials

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone usage skills and experience accessing e-learning platforms
context.additional_context: Aims to improve the usability of e-learning materials for language learning in smartphone-centric, resource-constrained technological environments.

learning_goals: Learners can identify 80% or more key usability issues in e-learning materials using heuristic evaluation methodologies.
Learners can apply the seven core heuristics—such as "system status visibility," "intuitive layout," and "standard consistency"—to real-world cases.
Learners can propose three practical strategies for improving e-learning material usability based on evaluation results.

resources: Online Whiteboard Tool for Team Collaboration
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
